derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'characteristic of a jumble or medley'): from modern Latin macaronicus, from obsolete Italian macaronico, a humorous formation from macaroni (see macaroni)

means.word_mean: 1. of or containing a mixture of Latin words and vernacular words jumbled together;
